sentences.english: Pick a crime from the menu, pick a sentence and defend you.
sentences.chinese: 找一个罪证，找一个理由为你辩白。

sentences.english: Moreover, official publications have expressed caution about putting the sweeping rules into effect.
sentences.chinese: 官方出版物正在对这项“扫荡”计划的出台做着辩白。

sentences.english: I would order my cause before him, and fill my mouth with arguments.
sentences.chinese: 我就在他面前将我的案件陈明，满口辩白。

sentences.english: We suspect that there will be all sorts of self-justifying guff from them.
sentences.chinese: 我怀疑这里会充满各式各样胡说八道的自我辩白。

sentences.english: I would order [my] cause before him, and fill my mouth with arguments.
sentences.chinese: 我就在他面前将我的案件陈明，满口辩白。

sentences.english: The company gave him an opportunity to clear himself.
sentences.chinese: 公司给了他一个辩白的机会。

sentences.english: Most of the arguments put forward by our opponents simply do not hold water.
sentences.chinese: 我们的对手提出的大部辩白解都站不住脚。

sentences.english: But I do not want to provide an explanation at all, having no regret because I have already die now.
sentences.chinese: 可是我一点也不想辩白，由于我今朝仍旧死而无憾了。
